Property.Name: BodyScript
QueryScript
Property.Value: SELECT ds.Id AS dsId , ds.Name AS dsName ,REPLACE(COALESCE(ds.DataSetPropertiesMetaQuery, dst.DefaulDataSetPropertiesMetaQuery), '%%DataSourceId%%',ds.Id) AS metaQuery FROM [load].[DataSource] AS ds JOIN [load].[DataSourceType] AS dst ON dst.Id = ds.DataSourceTypeId
